name: Jan Kurtz-Puga
text: Family Favorite in Folsom...I seem to have raised pizza snobs. Mountain Mike's has passed the grade for them! The restaurant is always clean & well-staffed, the pizza tastes great, and the orders are prepared quickly and ready ASAP.

name: Brian Lawrence
text: We moved from Sacramento and came in here for a buffet one day they have great service and food they always have fresh pizza on the line. The best part of it was when we lived in Sacramento we used to go to the La Riviera one not knowing ‚Ä¶More

name: Sydney Aldea
text: Bought 2 large pizza and Buffalo wings, asked for ranch and we only got 3 small containers. After I paid 70 bucks they can't give me more ranch or paper plates. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris McGraw
text: This place is amazing! Great pizza, super friendly staff, and rock bottom happy hour prices. Beer selection is great and special offers everyday. Will be making this a weekly dinner spot!!!!

name: Andrea Voss
text: I work next door at Maribou spa salon and come in all the time to get pizza and a cold beer after work! I prefer the 10 Barrel profuse juice ipa. The owners and employees are so nice and accommodating! Great family place and I think the best pizza at this location.

name: Tabetha Lawrence
text: Always outstanding service and pizza. The owner always greets us and is quick to bring out fresh pizza when people come in for the lunch buffet. The place is Always clean and quiet. This is our families #1 pizza spot. Top notch neighborhood pizza parlor.

name: Michelle Myers
text: We've come here several times since Blue Ravine/East Natoma Mountain Mike's opened. The service and pizza has been excellent! Paul is always so nice with a welcoming smile! Look forward to going to a happy hour! Definitely recommend this place!

name: Vijay Bhaskar Jonnalagadda
text: The thin crust specialty pizza I had was actually very good. Decent choice of beers. Reasonably good service

name: gabe borges
text: 1. Very clean!  2. Owner is very nice  3. Lunch buffet is excellent.  4. Prices are competitive.  5. Atmosphere is pleasant, roomy, bathrooms are clean, lots of tv's.

name: Louis Morales
text: Great pizza good service

name: Nabiha Siddiqui
text: I've been to this location three times and each time the food has been great and the service was friendly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great pizza joint!

name: zachary ballard
text: I just wanted to say how much I LOVE the pizza here! Hands down my favorite pepperoni! Love the mount veggiemore one with the artichokes and peppers! And I could eat like 8 bread sticks in one sitting I'm not even kidding lol.

name: Amanda Gootee
text: The pizza was AMAZING. Crispy thin crust, amazing salami and crispy pepperoni, great beer selection! So happy that our neighborhood has a pizza place we can walk to now! Very very happy with everything!

name: Creedence Johnson
text: The service was great. And the pizza was super duper good. I love the bbq chicken pizza!!

name: Perry Hough
text: The pizza the last 3 times we have ordered seems to be overcooked with burnt edges on it.  Service and the people are great here but maybe watch the cook time better

name: Chris Souza
text: Great food and great service! We always come back for more. There are many pizza places but we love the atmosphere here!

name: Christopher Hilton
text: As always nice staff and great food and the TVs and huge and they have all the good games on. Very clean too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shayal Devi
text: Love Wednesday night dinner buffet. It really nice and clean. Good prices on beers.

name: Jennifer Scofield
text: Great Place to Hang Out!  During Game Time all beers $2.99.  Lot's of TV's, great bar and salad bar!  Not to mention the pizza is excellent.

name: sameena Najam
text: We have gone to this place couple of times and every time we enjoy it.Amazing staff,clean place,good deals and delicious pizza and wings

name: svetya k
text: WONDERFUL SERVICE! i love coming here and everyone who works here is so nice and the food is soo good

name: R S
text: Tried this place for 1st and last time. I‚Äôve always liked Mountain Mike‚Äôs pizza. May be OK for delivery, But, from the minute you walk in, this place does not have a good vibe; too clinical. Servers do not wear name tags, so not possible to ‚Ä¶More

name: Patrick Haena
text: It's decent food, not worth the price though very expensive for some ok pizza and wings

name: Ty Maclure
text: Much nicer than I expected.  Prices are still high, but they have lots of big TVs and open seating

name: Ashley Brinson
text: Employees are super sweet and funny. Love coming to this place!

name: Esther Salazar
text: Thank you for opening! Absolutely love Mountain Mike‚Äôs pizza and you can‚Äôt beat this location. Very clean inside and pizza is always hot!

name: James Gootee
text: This new pizza restaurant is very clean, and the food was great ! From the wings to the salad to the pizzas it was all soooo good. I highly recommend it- and the workers were very nice and accommodating...Go try it !

name: Daniel Stiver
text: Great service! Great people! Great pizza!

name: Paul Gilbert
text: Frendly service and a Great selection  of craft beer! Always a great happy hour  to hit during  the week üçªüòÅüëç

name: anita nichols
text: Best pizza in Folsom. The place so clean, and I can enjoy pizza while watching games.

name: Moe Momeyer
text: Great food and even better service!! Fast too!!

name: Alyssa Rontelli
text: Great pizza and an excellent place to to watch a game. Great customer service as well :))!!

name: Stephen Velasquez
text: Probably the best pizza in town when it comes to California and some West coast state chains. This place is way better than the other location, the other location is really terrible, skip it and go to this new one. I ordered a large pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: John Ratliff
text: Very nice pizza and service

name: Tony Bottem
text: Nice place. Great pizza and salad bar

name: Mila Elizabeth
text: Love the lunch special and they always have good service.

name: Jovani TInoco
text: Very neat place , the pizza Is great and great service

name: Eugene Han
text: Love this place. Great deals on wings and beer!!  Go and support this mountain mikes!!!

name: Urbani Baseball
text: Great buffet!  Pizza is super with a wonderful crisp crust

name: Kevin Smithson
text: Terrible pizza, poorly baked and uncooked raw dough, poorly topped and prepared, the place smell like chemicals inside, they are consistently bad and hardly anyone inside for a reason, do yourself a favor and stay away haha

name: Kellyn Yatooma
text: great customer service and kind employees, great place to eat and work!!

name: Donald Stephens
text: Much better than the garbage pizza at next door Papa Johns. Love the seating area with your favorite sports channel on the big screens.

name: Lisa Smith
text: Always good pizza and nice new location.

name: Delnaz S
text: Not good experience

name: Cris Castro
text: love this mountain mikes, amaxing pizza.

name: Ryan Jones
text: Can't beat their all-you-can-eat buffet.

name: Eric Suit
text: Awesome! Staff is friendly

name: Brandon Munoz
text: 10/10 would eat at again!!!

name: Ranjit Sanghera
text: It's so good
